issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Cant confirm if this is a regression because of a blocker issue Timob - 10819

Description:
1.Package kitchensink using iOS 6 sdk.
2.Install it on Iphone 4S running iOS 6 beta through itunes.
3.Run kitchensink.
4.Tap on controls -> text fields -> events.
5.Tap on the text field so that the soft keyboard pops up.
6.Now turn the device to landscape mode with the keyboard up.
7.Notice that the screen changes the orientation to landscape but the keyboard stays in portrait mode & does not change to landscape mode.

Actual Result :
1.The soft keyboard does not change orientation when we change orientation of the device.

Expected Result:
1.The soft keyboard should change orientation when we change orientation of the device.
fields.summary: iOS: The soft keyboard does not change orientation when we change orientation of the device(only Iphone 4S running iOS 6 beta 4).
fields.environment:
tested on:
Iphone 4S running iOS6
Kitchensink packaged using iOS 6 SDK.
Titanium studio : 2.1.2.201208301612
Titanium mobile sdk  : 2.1.3.v20120904163110
OSX mountain lion 10.8.1

comments.body:
It works OK on iPad 3:

Titanium Studio, build: 2.1.3.201209101847
Titanium Studio SDK, build 2.1.3.v20120907163110
Device:
iPad 3-iOS6

This issue is not reproducible on iphone4 (iOS 5.1) running kitchensink built with iOS sdk 5.1 & titanium sdk : 2.1.3.v20120904163110.
Xcode : 4.4.1

Verified fix on:
Titanium studio : 2.1.2.201208301612
SDK version : 2.1.3.v20120915120319
Iphone 4S iOS 6
Ipod iOS 6
